TopicTitle: Why are former moderators allowed to keep their large avatars?

Articles.Content: I have noticed some former moderators who still have large avatars, is there a reason for this? I can see why moderators should have large avatars to be able to get peoples attention, but there isn't any reason for former moderators to have them that I know of.
Mostly, because the forum software needs a permission to make a larger avatar, but not to keep one. But also, the bigshots say its an acknowledgement of their efforts on behalf of the community.
Ok, giant animated penguins are distracting though. Thanks for the speedy reply.
